minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Let's discuss the ai insurance poc development and where we stand.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Don't scale too early. Make sure your latency is solid first.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: Have you tried this approach for MVP? It worked for us.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I understand the concerns about burn rate, but our POC metrics are strong.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Investor rejections are normal. Focus on improving your MRR metrics.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The valuation timeline is tight, but we're confident about user adoption.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: Fundraising is tough right now. How's your Series A progress?

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: We're addressing the latency issues and expect MRR to improve next quarter.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: Have you tried this approach for product-market fit? It worked for us.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The Series A timeline is tight, but we're confident about MVP.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Focus on SaaS metrics first. I made similar mistakes in my early days.
